about_the_game:
DLC 2 Tracing Action

In order to run DLC2, we need have main part of Dead Line and DLC1.

Open the third level ，Added a new map， Extend the follow-up story

Location:Entrance of Railway Station Hall
Objective:Stop Martin and get goods at Railway Station

Storm Team received intelligence from headquarters that M and R fled to and took control of the railway station. The squad chased to the station and was getting fire from the station hall to the platform.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: I5 3470
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows7 Windows10
  • Processor: I7 4790
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
